name: Tuna and Rice
ingredients: 1 cans of tuna in water, drained
1/2 can of chickpeas, drained and rinsed

instructions.en: Rinse the rice in a colander until the water runs clear
instructions.sk: Prepláchnite ryžu v cedníku, kým voda nebude čistá
instructions.ja: 米をざるで水がきれいになるまですすぐ

instructions.en: Add the rinsed rice and 4 cups of water to the rice cooker
instructions.sk: Pridajte prepláchnutú ryžu a 4 šálky vody do ryžovaru
instructions.ja: すすいだ米と4カップの水を炊飯器に入れる

instructions.en: Cook the rice in the rice cooker according to the manufacturer's instructions
instructions.sk: Uvarte ryžu v ryžovari podľa pokynov výrobcu
instructions.ja: 炊飯器の説明書に従って米を炊く

instructions.en: While the rice is cooking, drain the tuna and chickpeas
instructions.sk: Kým sa ryža varí, sceďte tuniak a cícer
instructions.ja: 米が炊けている間に、ツナとひよこ豆の水気を切る

instructions.en: Once the rice is cooked, fluff it with a fork and add the drained tuna and chickpeas
instructions.sk: Keď je ryža uvarená, nakyprite ju vidličkou a pridajte scedený tuniak a cícer
instructions.ja: 米が炊けたら、フォークでほぐし、水気を切ったツナとひよこ豆を加える

instructions.en: Gently mix the tuna and chickpeas with the rice
instructions.sk: Jemne premiešajte tuniak a cícer s ryžou
instructions.ja: ツナとひよこ豆を米と優しく混ぜ合わせる

instructions.en: Serve in bowls and add soy sauce and hot sauce (if available) to taste
instructions.sk: Podávajte v miskách a pridajte sójovú omáčku a pálivú omáčku (ak používate) podľa chuti
instructions.ja: 器に盛り、好みで醤油と辛いソースをかける

instructions.en: Consume daily for 6+ months at a time, live in canada, with no(very little) chance of escape, and try to be thankful and optimistic for the future
instructions.sk: Konzumujte denne po dobu 6 a viac mesiacov, žite v Kanade a snažte sa byť optimistickí a vďační
instructions.ja: 6ヶ月以上毎日摂取し、カナダに住み、楽観的で感謝の気持ちを持つよう心がける
